title.narrative: IR 4- APPUI AU SYSTEME DE SANTE

description.narrative: By 2015, the health system plans, budgets, and develops the community approach manages procurement services of health supplies and responds effectively to emergencies, taking into account gender and equity., which contributes to Child Health, Health Systems Strengthening. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2015, the percentage of mothers, newborns and children effectively using quality high impact interventions in health and nutrition has increased, especially at community level.

title.narrative: By 2015, the health system plans, budgets, and develops the community approach; manages procurement services of health supplies;and responds effectively to emergencies, taking into account gender and equity.

description.narrative: UNICEF supported MoH with development or update of five strategic documents, taking into account the gender and equity aspects. UNICEF continued to play a crucial role in the implementation of the free health care policy for under five children and pregnant women, contributing to the increased utilization of health services. | Status:Met | As-of Date:30/03/2018
